name: Life Defence
description:
A mix between tower defense games and the Game of Life.

Inspired by John Conway's Game of Life and Cary Huang's Game of Life and Death.

Clicking the big window above will open the documentation of the game's source code. See below for a downloadable executable.

The game is currently in development. A demo will be available here as soon as I have completed a proper release.

The plan is to first release a PC version, then expand to Linux and MacOS as well as Android.

Developed using C++.

Dependencies : SDL2 framework ; Niels Lohmann's "JSON for modern C++".

Documented using Doxygen.

Version tracking using Git.
